A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson should be sacked from Disney with immediate effect and never be allowed anywhere near a Star Wars film again. I have been a Star Wars fan for my entire life and I've never hated a film so much. Disney have let down the fans and let down our heroes. How this film got a green light to be made is beyond me. Although this film is filled with some amazing CGI and some cool fight scenes it didn't feel like a Star Wars film in the slightest. Hollow plot lines that go nowhere and zero character development. The film Felt More Like spaceballs 2 them a Star Wars film. Nothing more than a slap in the face from someone that clearly hates the franchise. You can shove this film up your ass.
